name: Dizzy Hearts
blurb: Dizzy Hearts is the story of a young girl who travels far from home. She meets Mercilia, a young elf at odds with her destiny.

rewards.reward: No Reward

[Chibi Hearts] \u2014 I will send you a chibi picture of a Dizzy Hearts character of your choice, with a personal thank you note on it by that character, signed by me. Delivered upon completion of this Kickstarter!

(Add-on to any physical pledge reward.) [Chibi Hearts Buttons] \u2014 Add-on package. If you've made a pledge you can add a Chibi Hearts pin-on button of your favorite character to the reward. (mock-up pending)

[Wallpaper Collection Pack] \u2014 A collection of every wallpaper used in DH, available in 1080p and 720p formats. Higher and lower resolutions available on demand. To be delivered on completion of the game.

(Add-on to any physical pledge reward.) [Chibi Hearts Buttons Super Pack] \u2014 Add-on package. If you've made a pledge, add a Chibi Hearts pin-on button of all Chibi Hearts characters. (mock-up pending)
[Dizzy Hearts + Original Soundtrack] \u2014 A digital copy of the full game and soundtrack, to be delivered on completion of the game.

[Dizzy Hearts + Original Soundtrack + all background art in 720p] \u2014 A digital copy of the full game, soundtrack and a copy of all the game\u2019s backgrounds in 720p, to be delivered on completion of the game.

[Dizzy Hearts: Radiant Period Compendium (PDF)] \u2014 Upon completion of the game I will create the Radiant Period Compendium. This is the "god book" used to create Dizzy Hearts and is the go to source on every aspect of this period in the game\u2019s history. The book details the geography, topology, bestiary, nations and races of the Radiant period. About the cities each race lives in, their diets, culture and history. Complete with black and white diagrams, city plans and more! To be finished and delivered after completion of the game.
[FLAC Soundtrack] \u2014 The physical soundtrack for Dizzy Hearts in FLAC format. To be delivered on completion of the game.
[Dizzy Hearts + Original Soundtrack + Radiant Period Compendium(PDF)] \u2014 Also includes the Wallpaper Collection Pack. To be delivered on completion of the game.

[Dizzy Hearts: Radiant Period Compendium Hardcover Edition] \u2014 Receive the Radiant Period Compendium printed in hardcover. It will be signed to you as per request and include a character sketch of your choice tucked inside. The character must be one from Dizzy Hearts or of my own creation. To be finished and delivered after completion of the game.
[Dizzy Hearts game box + Original Soundtrack + Radiant Period Compendium(PDF)] \u2014 Also includes the Wallpaper Collection Pack. To be delivered on completion of the game.

[Dizzy Hearts limited edition game box + FLAC Soundtrack + Radiant Period Hardcover] \u2014 The limited edition game box will feature completely unique art (mock-up pending). It will include a full sketch of your choice with a personal thank you note from me. To be delivered on completion of the game.

[Dakimakura and/or Wallscroll Add-on Package] \u2014 Add $90 to your pledge in $90 increments to order more than one Dakimakura or Wallscroll to your reward. To be delivered on completion of the game. This reward might not be available while estimated supplies last. However I will be printing more dakimakura or wallscrolls based on the demands of the backers.  \u2014 To get a deluxe wallscroll please add $120

[Individual Character Dakimakura] You will receive one double-sided dakimakura cover of any of the five main characters or Queen Llend. For mature backers. Includes physical copy of the game and soundtrack, to be delivered on completion of the game. (After the the completion of this Kickstarter, I will talk to all those who pledged for this reward and discuss the design of the body pillows.)

[Full Character Art Wallscroll] \u2014 A 16" x 48" (2400x7200px) wall scroll of the character of your choice in their full size character sprites (as scene on this character page) printed in the absolute highest resolution possible. Includes physical copy of the game and soundtrack, to be delivered on completion of the game. To be created and delivered on completion of this Kickstarter.

[Dizzy Hearts limited edition game box + FLAC Soundtrack + Radiant Period Hardcover] + [Individual Character Dakimakura] OR(not both) [Character Wallscroll] \u2014 The limited edition game box will feature completely unique art (mock-up pending). It will include a full sketch of your choice with a personal thank you note from me. It will also include your choice of either a Individual Character Dakimakura, Character Wall Scroll. To be delivered on completion of the game.

[Deluxe Dizzy Hearts Wallscroll] \u2014 A 32" x 48" (4800x7200px) A deluxe super sized wall scroll. Of brand new art dedicated just to this reward. (mock-ups pending soon) Includes physical copy of the game and soundtrack, to be delivered on completion of the game. To be created and delivered on completion of this Kickstarter.

[Skype Q&A + Stream Session] \u2014 I will host a stream and a one-on-one Skype call after the release of Dizzy Hearts, where I will answer any questions you have regarding the game (that aren't spoilers) while I draw sketch requests for you. The stream will be approximately 8 hours long (minimum of 6 hours long) and we can schedule it when it is most suitable for you. The scheduling of each slot will take place a week apart from each other for recovery. First come first serve! This tier includes a physical copy of the game and soundtrack.

[Design a character!] \u2014 You and I will have a one-on-one Skype call and together we will design a background character for the game that fits the setting/story/location, including elements of their story, personality, looks and more. This character will be written into the story of Dizzy Hearts or Vagabond. In addition to this, your name/handle will be mentioned in the 'special thanks' section of the game\u2019s prologue. Delivered upon completion of this Kickstarter! This tier also includes a physical copy of the game + soundtrack + Radiant Period Compendium (these to be delivered on completion of the game).

[Super Dakimakura Set] \u2014 You will receive dakimakura covers of all five main characters. These covers are only suitable for mature backers. This tier includes a physical copy of the game + soundtrack + Radiant Period Compendium, to be delivered on completion of the game.

[Silver Mushroom Ticket] \u2014 Every dakimakura or wallscroll available up to a combination of five. The button set, the [Design a character!] pledge. The limited edition game box, hardcover compendium, FLAC soundtrack, stream session, wallpaper pack, button pack, 2 extra game copies.

[Golden Mushroom Ticket] \u2014 Includes [Silver Mushroom Ticket] and limited edition game copies of Vagabond, Schism and Nephilim (The next 4 games in a series of games in this universe.) including internal access to the development of those games and Dizzy Hearts. Also includes every dakimakura cover and every wallscroll (including the deluxe ones) I will also travel to any convention of your choice within the continental US and either host a table or panel depending on availability. [details pending]
